pages.title: Lie Down
pages.text: While it is one of the easier commands for Pet Rocks™ to learn, teaching the $(bold)Lie Down$() command is best accomplished in conjunction with $(bold)Sit$().$(br2)After your Pet Rock™ has remained in the sitting position for a while, give it the $(bold)Lie Down$() command.$(br2)If you made a big fuss about properly teaching your rock to
sit, it may be reluctant to move. You can push your rock firmly into the ground and it will soon understand what you want it to do.$(br2)Be sure to praise your rock and give it a reassuring hug.
